website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice of a subwoofer for anyone looking for their first audio upgrade.
pros: Compatible with many aftermarket and factory-installed stereos and amplifiers
Maximum power offers a good low range that other budget subwoofers lack
cons: Car interior may require some alterations or a special subwoofer enclosure for best results

customer_reviews.title: Im in love with these 15s
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 15s wlldse i love em. I have a 1000watt skar amp hooked up and its shuting off the amp. These subs need a good amp but they do sound NICE and well worth the 230$ i paid for them both im happy with the wlldse subwoofers
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Voice coil hits, and overall ok-ish performance
customer_reviews.text: The product is good for what you're paying, still would not purchase it again. Voice coil hits before I even hit half way on my amp. I was tested the sub with another 10" mtx running parallel at around 2 ohms, and the amp only puts out around 600watts rms. Overall performs worse than my other subs that are only rated at 200watts rms. I would only recommend these to people who are going to put the time in to build a box for it bc I tried off the shelve sealed and ported boxes and still got ok-ish results.
customer_reviews.author: Tascha Shahriari-Parsa

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: the sub sound great, probably the best subs I bought it this price point. The 10-inch Subs are only rated at 400 watt RMS but I would say they're more of a 6 or 700 watt RMS Sub. Sewn on surround, hard fiberglass dust cap, cast basket, and sewn in woven speaker leads. The only thing I can think negative about them was they put a ugly decal on the magnet and I tore them off to reveal the Chrome backplate.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than I thought they was going to be. Got these for a quick replacement due to blowing my other pair. But these are pretty dope. Only bad thing is that they dont pick up on deep lows. But mids and high maybe my best set of subs ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This Subwoofer lasted about 1hr of total play time before the the Voice coil came unwound from the former and it was game over. Sounded good while it was able to play. However it will be the last WLLDSE product I ever purchase. Sub was wired to 4ohm to meet the supposed RMS power rating and my amp gain was set with an oscilloscope still it fell apart very quickly. Massive bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Slight ordering issue but customer service was on top of my complaint in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. Had the professionally installed in a Q bomb ported enclosure. The are pushed by a Audio Planet 5000 monoblock class D amp. Don't have to turn my stock radio all the up before the bass and pressure is too much
customer_reviews.author: C. LaKnow

customer_reviews.title: Great Subwoofer!
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this and I'm impressed. I have it running at 2 ohms from my Class D Amp and the bass is definitely what I wanted to hear. 400 RMS, can't beat this for the price! Well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing I'm used to running high end subs I figured for the price it was going to be a joke but I play it everyday on 1000watts (real watts) and It takes a beating only issue i has was that one of the termernal screws was stripped out from the factory but i fixed it my self
customer_reviews.author: anthony wilson

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Seemed well built but has a faint rattle not sure what it is. They also smelled burnt but it still played.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I read all the other reviews that spoke of how good these subwoofers sound but had no idea they were this good I am glad I purchased this item they are as good as people say.
customer_reviews.author: robert thomas

customer_reviews.title: I love these subs nice lows and highs on bass would ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these subs nice lows and highs on bass would recommend to anyone getting another set to have 4 soon
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for a budget build
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy, especially for the price. Seems like a quality build. Been running it for a few months with about 4-500 rms going to it in a ported box. Bumps pretty good. Would buy another. Isn't gonna hit the super-lows but puts out a lot of sound. It's a good compliment to my 12's.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great sub
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a weak planet audio sub 12 .. This wlldse is beating my Ford Fusion just right an it's 1 in a ported box 1100 boss amp.. Sheesh you can feel it, thinking about buying 2 it's some hard budget thump, but most people gonna think you spent hundreds if you set it an hook it up right 2ohm this sub
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big bass
customer_reviews.text: great speaker great company they really care about customer satisfaction...Will buy more of there speakers 🔊
customer_reviews.author: Bradley lake

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a steal.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute steal got a Skar audio ix and ct sounds bio 10” for a steal great quality sound and product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: won't really play the low stuff
customer_reviews.text: this subwoofer is not bad....FOR THE PRICE, it's not made to play the low notes but your higher bass notes, it plays alright. by the way, there is NO MANUAL everything is on the box. this is also NOT a 1500 watt rms sub, more like 800-1000 (146 oz magnet)
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: 10" wlldse subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing hits hard i love it got it sitting at 350 watts and broke my rear view mirror off
customer_reviews.author: Brysen allred

customer_reviews.title: These wlldse cvl-12 subwoofers are a good deal for the perfomance they put out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 wlldse cvl-12 and I have not been disappointed these subwoofers sound awesome in the custom 6th order series tuned box I built for them they have great output and get pretty low
customer_reviews.author: @Fontana_dually909

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely based on the size of the magnet relative to the price.
customer_reviews.author: obsolete_zach

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: They have been working perfectly for me i love them, going to perches more in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: There good speakers but lied about the wattage
customer_reviews.text: False advertising it says 4500 but when you get it it's 3000
customer_reviews.author: Terry H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a good price. But they are not 4 ohm...... They are 6 ohms I've tested them with a digital multimeter and there 6 ohms I couldn't get them to wire at 1 ohm load at the amp and was really disappointed cause my skar amp runs 1500+ watts at one ohm these speakers will only wire down to 2 ohm and it makes me have a 900 watt amp... DAMN WLLDSE
customer_reviews.author: Keith Scaglione

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: My car doesn’t have speakers in the back and feel is just not the same. I saw this speaker for a reasonably cheap price so I decided to give it a try. The sound is okay. I plan to buy another one to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: Yilin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tight spaces that cant fit a box
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent speaker for the price. It is NOT a speaker for those that expect a large boom and to be heard down the street. It is however a great option if you have limited space and want to add some extra bass to your music. **Tip** Use an amp that matches the speaker max output.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: The sub look great. But they don't sounds like they look
customer_reviews.text: The sub look great. But they don't sounds like they look. I buy two 12" one thing i didn't like is, they don't play lows... they good but not great
customer_reviews.author: xterra

customer_reviews.title: Beats hard for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bangs pretty hard and sounds more like a awesome 12 then a 15(15 inch is what I bought) have 5000 watt orian amp powering it and it’s just not as loud as I expected
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: this woofer kicks a bunch of ass. if i were on the moon i could hear it.
customer_reviews.text: DAMMMMMMM...... IT will make ur ears bleed. came early and sounds really good for the price. Deep,deep BASS.. will buy again. hot dammmmmn. i turned this bad boy up today. im running a 1000 watt amp through it and its real okay. .
customer_reviews.author: DJ  Storm

customer_reviews.title: These subs are legit. Have it in a ported ...
customer_reviews.text: These subs are legit. Have it in a ported box and a 500 mono amp. Flexes my wife’s windshield
customer_reviews.author: jason c.

customer_reviews.title: Marked up speaker looked used
customer_reviews.text: Comes marked up sounds nice but not happy about getting what looked to be a used speaker
customer_reviews.author: Bradley lake

customer_reviews.title: Good budget subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: HCB 10 is a good sub for the price. I'm running it way over the peak watts and it seems to be handling it okay.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: WLLDSE 15 Inch 3000 Watt Peak Momentary Power Dual 2 Ohm Car Subwoofer, White
feature_bullets: Peak Momentary Power Output：3000 Watts | Max Power:2000 Watts| RMS Power:1000 Watts
Sensitivity: 88.8dB (1W/1m) | Resonant Frequency: 32.4 Hz | Impedance: Dual 2 ohm
2.5 inch high temperature copper voice coil| 7 inch mounting height | 14.7 inch mounting hole diameter
SUPERIORITY: High roller foam surround, high flux ferrite motor, high secure stitch, high duty aluminum frame
POWERFUL: There is quite large space between the horn bowl and the copper voice coil, which ensures the explosive power of the bass

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
